scenario_text.value:
Yeah, sorry. I tripped over something and
almost fell over.

You have to watch your step, Saki. The ground
is all uneven here.
So...is this what you tripped over?

I’m...not really sure, but why don’t you hold
on to it, Takuma?
You never know when it might come in handy.
That’s true. I think I will hold on to it.

I checked to see if anything else like that
thing was lying around, but no luck.
